Title: Relates to prescribing an opioid antagonist with a patient's first opioid analgesic prescription each year
Summary: Provides that every initial opioid analgesic prescription per year, which is equal to or greater than fifty morphine milligram equivalents, shall be accompanied with a prescription for an opioid antagonist.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prescribing an opioid antagonist with a patient's first opioid analgesic prescription in a given year
